Shonen.description: Action-packed anime typically featuring young male protagonists on a journey of growth, battles, and friendship.

titles.Jujutsu Kaisen: A dark fantasy anime following Yuji Itadori as he fights curses and seeks to control the King of Curses, Sukuna.
titles.Chainsaw Man: A brutal action anime about Denji, a young man who merges with a chainsaw demon to hunt devils.
titles.Demon Slayer: Tanjiro Kamado seeks revenge against demons after his family is slaughtered and his sister is turned into one.
titles.One Piece (Final Saga): Monkey D. Luffy continues his quest to become the Pirate King, facing powerful enemies in the final saga.
titles.Attack on Titan: Final Season: Humanity's last stand against the Titans takes shocking turns as Eren Yeager leads a revolution.

Isekai.description: Anime where characters are transported to another world, often featuring RPG elements and powerful protagonists.

titles.Solo Leveling: Jin-Woo, a weak hunter, gains extraordinary powers and rises to become the world's strongest hunter.
titles.Mushoku Tensei: A man is reincarnated in a magical world and seeks to live a better life.
titles.Re:Zero: Subaru can rewind time upon death but must endure intense suffering.
titles.That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: A man is reborn as a slime and builds a powerful new world.

Fantasy.description: Anime set in magical worlds filled with mystical creatures, legendary heroes, and grand adventures.

titles.Fate/Strange Fake: A unique Holy Grail War unfolds in a city full of powerful mages and servants.
titles.Berserk: A brutal story of vengeance and fate following the warrior Guts and his tragic past.
titles.Tower of God: A boy climbs a mysterious tower full of trials to reunite with his lost friend.

Sci-Fi.description: Anime that explores futuristic themes, technology, space travel, cybernetics, and artificial intelligence.

titles.Cyberpunk: Edgerunners: A young mercenary struggles to survive in a cyber-enhanced dystopian world.
titles.PLUTO: A deep psychological thriller based on Osamu Tezuka’s Astro Boy universe.
titles.Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercu: A new Gundam series featuring political intrigue and space battles.

Psychological.description: Anime that challenges the mind with complex characters, deep storytelling, and intense psychological battles.

titles.Death Note: A high school student finds a notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it.
titles.Monster: A doctor’s life unravels after he saves the life of a young boy who turns out to be a killer.
titles.Steins;Gate: A group of friends discovers time travel but faces unforeseen consequences.

Romance.description: Anime that focuses on relationships, love stories, and emotional connections between characters.

titles.Your Name: Two strangers connected through time and dreams try to find each other.
titles.A Silent Voice: A former bully seeks redemption by reconnecting with a deaf girl he tormented in the past.
titles.Toradora!: Two students with crushes on each other’s best friends form an unlikely bond.

Comedy.description: Anime designed to entertain with humor, absurd situations, and lighthearted storytelling.

titles.Spy x Family: A spy must build a fake family to complete his mission, but his 'family' members have their own secrets.
titles.Nichijou: A surreal comedy showcasing bizarre yet hilarious everyday events.
titles.Gintama: A samurai and his friends take odd jobs in a world overrun by aliens.

Sports.description: Anime that focuses on competition, teamwork, and the personal growth of athletes in various sports.

titles.Blue Lock: Japan’s best soccer prospects compete to become the ultimate striker.
titles.Haikyuu!!: A determined volleyball player and his team strive to reach the top.
titles.Slam Dunk: A delinquent joins a high school basketball team to impress a girl.

Horror.description: Anime that focuses on terrifying situations, psychological horror, and supernatural elements.

titles.Another: A cursed classroom leads to mysterious and gruesome deaths.
titles.Higurashi: When They Cry: A small village harbors dark secrets and recurring tragedies.
titles.Parasyte: A teenager fights for survival when parasites begin taking over human bodies.

Mecha.description: Anime that features giant robots piloted by humans in futuristic settings.

titles.Neon Genesis Evangelion: Teenagers pilot giant mechs to fight monstrous beings known as Angels.
titles.Gurren Lagann: A young man joins a rebellion against a tyrannical ruler in a mech-driven world.
titles.Code Geass: A strategic genius gains the power to command anyone and leads a revolution.

Mystery.description: Anime revolving around solving crimes, uncovering secrets, and engaging in deep investigations.

titles.Detective Conan: A genius detective trapped in a child's body solves crimes.
titles.The Promised Neverland: Orphans discover a horrifying truth about their existence.
titles.Erased: A man travels back in time to prevent a series of murders.

Slice of Life.description: Anime focusing on the everyday lives and personal experiences of characters.

titles.March Comes in Like a Lion: A young shogi player navigates personal struggles and relationships.
titles.Barakamon: A calligrapher moves to a rural village and finds inspiration in its people.
titles.Clannad: A heartfelt drama about love, loss, and family connections.
